summary: The class encapsulates read‑only information retrieved from the MAPDL ``/STATUS`` command, exposing details such as product name, MAPDL version, configuration values, capabilities, job and model metadata, and other runtime status. It formats this data for display when the MAPDL object is printed and caches results to avoid repeated queries.
business_intent: Provide a convenient, immutable interface for accessing and presenting MAPDL environment and execution details, supporting diagnostics, reporting, and programmatic inspection of the solver state.
